title: stack overflow in enable-debug rustc from run-pass/super-fast-paren-parsing.rs

labels.name: A-testsuite
labels.description: Area: The testsuite used to check the correctness of rustc

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
```
CFG_CONFIGURE_ARGS   := --enable-debug --enable-optimize --enable-ccache --enable-clang --prefix=~/opt/rust-dbg --disable-optimize-tests --disable-llvm-assertions
```

during make check hits:

```
failures:
```
